original_text:
The wind blows to the south
    and goes around to the north;
around and around goes the wind,
    and on its circuits the wind returns.
korean_text: 바람은 남으로 불다가 북으로 돌아가며 이리 돌며 저리 돌아 바람은 그 불던 곳으로 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: The wind blows to the south
and goes around to the north
around and around goes the wind
and on its circuits the wind returns
